revised_title: Investigating the Micro-Organisms in Cancerous Tumours
tldr: The authors investigate the presence of micro-organisms in cancerous tumours and their potential role in cancer development. They conduct experiments using carcinomata and other tumours, attempting to cultivate micro-organisms and transplant cancerous tissues into animals. Despite negative results in cultivating micro-organisms, the authors do not dismiss the possibility of cancer being micro-parasitic in origin and suggest further research into suitable culture media.
